title: Friend Like Ben: A Mother Desperate for Love
description: This is the heart-warming true story of a little boy and the cat that changed his life. Ten-year-old George was severely autistic; quiet and withdrawn, he appeared lost in his own world most of the time. Then, one day, a small black-and-white stray cat appeared at the bottom of the garden and George's face lit up.
author: Julia Romp
